overview:
AlertFlyers is a new email blast solution that provides a total online email marketing solution unlike most others. AlertFlyers is a complete online system that offers a huge array of inclusive features, extremely competitive pricing, and simplified user tools, all bundled in a super easy to use online solution.

Besides being easy and affordable, and while not ignoring those users wanting the traditional softer sell newsletter formats (which most email marketing providers exclusively offer), AlertFlyers has smartly designed their system for users primarily wanting a more hard hitting promotional format.

What’s great about AlertFlyers, is unlike itâ€™s more popular competitors, there are no monthly fees or minimum charges; membership is free (although they have an annual preferred membership option for only $99.95 that provides 25% off all purchases); and what they include are sure to make email marketers take notice.

AlertFlyers charges as little as $9.95 per campaign and their pricing per thousand costs are noticeably less than other email marketing providers. However, if thatâ€™s not reason enough to try them out, they include an amazing array of complimenting features that are sure to boost anyoneâ€™s email marketing efforts.

AlertFlyers includes with every email campaign itâ€™s own web site and unique URL you can post anywhere on the internet. They include a 12-image slide show (a great feature that can be used for not only product images, but for creating online presentations). For increasing reader click-through performance, they include icon and link choices you can customize. Once youâ€™ve done so, they are automatically placed along the base of each flyer sent. AlertFlyers also includes a very comprehensive tracking and reporting system, an email list index and list management suite that even includes a tool to create personalized opt-in lists, not bad for less than ten bucks.
